Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Interface Playable

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApolloCard, ArtemisCard, AthenaCard, AthenaCardDecorator, AtlasCard, Card, CardDecorator, ChronusCard, ChronusCardDecorator, DemeterCard, HephaestusCard, HeraCard, HeraCardDecorator, HestiaCard, MinotaurCard, PanCard, PrometheusCard, TritonCard, ZeusCard
public interface Playable
This interface defines classes that can perform all game-related actions, allowing to play a turn completely. All Card implement this, and all CardDecorator too. This allows the decorator to dynamically change cards behaviours when they are attached to them.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void build​(Tile builtTile)
    Build the specified tile one ETileLevel higher or create a dome.
    void checkWinCondition()
    Check for winning conditions met in this turn.
    Playable getPlayable()  
    java.util.List<Tile> getTilesToBuild()

    Generate all possible builds from a starting Tile taking into account this Card rules of building.
    java.util.List<Tile> getTilesToMove()  
    java.util.List<Tile> getTilesToMove​(Tile tile)
    Generate all possible moves from a starting Tile taking into account this Card rules of movement.
    void move​(Tile destinationTile)
    Move the selected Worker to the specified tile.
    void selectWorker​(Worker worker)
    Select a Worker between those owned by the current player.

    Set if it is still possible to change selected worker.

    Set this Card decorator or this CardDecorator wrappee.
    void useGodPower​(boolean isUsed)
    Reacts to the player's manifest choice of using/not using this Card godpower.

  • Method Details

    • selectWorker

      void selectWorker​(Worker worker)
      Select a Worker between those owned by the current player. This worker will be the one to move and build in the next phases.
      Parameters:
      worker - The worker indicated for selection

    • move

      void move​(Tile destinationTile)
      Move the selected Worker to the specified tile. This tile must be included in the result set of Playable#getTilesToMove.
      Parameters:
      destinationTile - The Tile where the worker is going to be moved to

    • build

      void build​(Tile builtTile)
      Build the specified tile one ETileLevel higher or create a dome. This tile must be included in the result set of Playable#getTilesToBuild.
      Parameters:
      builtTile - The Tile where the worker will build

    • useGodPower

      void useGodPower​(boolean isUsed)
      Reacts to the player's manifest choice of using/not using this Card godpower. The specific actions done vary from card to card. Not all cards actually use this method.
      Parameters:
      isUsed - Indicates if the godpower will be used this turn.

    • getTilesToMove

      java.util.List<Tile> getTilesToMove​(Tile tile)
      Generate all possible moves from a starting Tile taking into account this Card rules of movement.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile where the worker is currently placed
      Returns:
      All possible tiles where the worker can move

    • getTilesToMove

      java.util.List<Tile> getTilesToMove()
      Returns:
      The already generated set of possible moves

    • getTilesToBuild

      java.util.List<Tile> getTilesToBuild​(Tile tile)
      Generate all possible builds from a starting Tile taking into account this Card rules of building.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile where the worker is currently placed
      Returns:
      All possible tiles where the worker can build

    • getTilesToBuild

      java.util.List<Tile> getTilesToBuild()
      Returns:
      The already generated set of possible build

    • checkWinCondition

      void checkWinCondition()
      Check for winning conditions met in this turn. Generally called in Card#move.

    • getPlayable

      Playable getPlayable()
      Returns:
      This Card decorator or this CardDecorator wrappee.

    • setPlayable

      void setPlayable​(Playable decorator)
      Set this Card decorator or this CardDecorator wrappee.
      Parameters:
      decorator - A Playable

    • setCanChangeWorkerSelection

      void setCanChangeWorkerSelection​(boolean canChangeWorkerSelection)
      Set if it is still possible to change selected worker.
      Parameters:
      canChangeWorkerSelection - indicate if it is still possible to change selected worker
